response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Considering its unique features and the value it brings, I propose a special introductory price of $10,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. Please let me know if this proposition aligns with your interests and budget. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10500}
